General.Name: Sapmer
General.Description: Sapmer SA operates as a fishing company in South Africa, Northern America, Mauritius, Japan, Europe, China, and Réunion Island. The company offers fresh and frozen fish products, including ahi tuna, skipjack tuna, Patagonian toothfish, and rock lobster. It serves supermarkets and restaurants. The company was founded in 1947 and is headquartered in Le Port, Reunion.
General.Address: Darse de pêche, Le Port, Reunion, 97823
